text: Ture Lennart Bodström (20 April 1928 - 30 April 2015) was a Swedish politician. He was born in Gothenburg. He served as the Minister for Foreign Affairs in Olof Palme's Social Democratic cabinet from 1982 to 1985. Following the 1985 election, Bodström was reassigned to the post of Minister for Education. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Government ministers of Sweden Category:Politicians from Gothenburg
title: Lennart Bodström
